 Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitition. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
cbvalv.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvexv $p |- ( E. x ph <-> E. y ps ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
